item.title: skeletal muscle
item.description:
Tissue Sentence Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of skeletal muscle tissue in 6 abstracts.

PMID Senteces
10732455 In the peroperative and postoperative period all classical markers were elevated, in contrast to cTnI and cTnT, because of the concomitant skeletal muscle damage.
22849735 It was not until focal invasion into the skeletal muscle was discovered on permanent sections that a diagnosis of DMM could be established.
30886321 Pre-sarcopenia was defined as low appendicular skeletal muscle mass (≤ 7.26 kg/m2 for men and ≤ 5.45 kg/m2 for women), measured by dual energy X-ray absorptiometry.
32213537 Cachexia is common in malignant mesothelioma (MM); half of patients have malnutrition and low skeletal muscle mass. […] The aim of this study is to examine the efficacy of anamorelin in improving appendicular skeletal muscle mass (ASM) and patient-reported outcomes in patients with MM with cachexia.
7479364 The left temporal muscle and proximal limb skeletal muscles of the right upper arm and both thighs exhibited multiple metastases measuring up to 7 cm in diameter. […] Reviewing the literature, it is thought that in the presented case the long survival time of the patient and his protracted preterminal immobility could have contributed to the unusual formation of multiple skeletal muscle metastases.
8692714 The tissues of the pulmonary parenchyma and of the pleura are negative for calretinin except for the rare fibroblasts and some skeletal muscle fibres situated in the interstices of, or near the epithelial tumour mass.
